    University of Toronto, 2014 - 2017

    Supervision

    2024.07 Our paper Opti-Acoustic Semantic SLAM with Unknown Objects in Underwater Environments was accepted for publication in IROS 2024.

    2024.03 We submitted a paper Opti-Acoustic Semantic SLAM with Unknown Objects in Underwater Environments. Check out our project page.

    2024.02 I completed MIT Research Mentoring Certificate.

    2024.01 Our paper Diver Identification Using Anthropometric Data Ratios for Underwater Multi-Human-Robot Collaboration was accepted for publication in RA-L.

    2023.10 I presented “Human-Robot Teaming for Complex Undersea Missions” at the IROS 2023 2nd Advanced Marine Robotics TC Workshop as an invited speaker.

    2023.09 I submitted a paper Diver Identification Using Anthropometric Data Ratios for Underwater Multi-Human-Robot Collaboration.

    2023.09 I am starting as a postdoctoral associate in Marine Robotics Group at MIT CSAIL working with Prof. John Leonard.

    2023.07 I received my Ph.D. degree in Computer Science from the University of Minnesota Twin Cities.
